mapper.insert: insert into comment_info (cmt_content, user_id, post_idx) values (#{cmt_content}, #{user_id}, #{post_idx})
mapper.update: update comment_info set cmt_content=#{cmt_content} where cmt_idx=#{cmt_idx} and post_idx=#{post_idx}
mapper.select: select video_name, video_thumb, url_name, count(url_name) as url_count from dist_info group by video_name, video_thumb, url_name order by url_count desc LIMIT 10;
select post_title, user_id, count(post_views) as post_count from post_info group by post_title, user_id order by post_count desc LIMIT 10;
